title: Just Another Foundry
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004810/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004810/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Just Another Foundry**

Founded 2005 by [Tim Ahrens](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004810/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tim%20Ahrens).

[http://justanotherfoundry.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004810/http:/justanotherfoundry.com/)

Fonts include:  
JAF Lapture  
JAF Facit  
JAF Mashine  
JAF Zalamander
author: Tim Ahrens
